title: No level up reward!
body: I leveled up last night and still have not received my reward. Leveled up from 35 to 36 if that matters.

replies.body: Yep, looks like the system missed giving you the capsule for level 36. Be sure to check your loot again now for that capsule though!

I leveled 33-34 and got no reward. But when I went from 34-35 I got one. Not sure what's up with that. But I've been seeing a bunch of posts about people having the same problem - leveling up with no rewards.

> [{quoted}](name=Concara86,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=MeQEJc38,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-28T00:34:48.218+0000)
>
> I leveled 33-34 and got no reward. But when I went from 34-35 I got one. Not sure what's up with that. But I've been seeing a bunch of posts about people having the same problem - leveling up with no rewards.

Yeah same here. No reward 34-35, got one 35-36. Its definitely a bug, and maybe has been silently fixed? I dunno. Guess they don't want to return the capsules or admit the mistake actively, since its either too much hassle, or its another way to make players pay money.

It's just still being looked into is all. We're helping where we can, but if you don't make your own post it's pretty likely we won't notice a reply. If you don't reply to my comment specifically, it won't ever notify me. It'd also get fixed a lot quicker if you shoot a ticket over, since that won't ever get skipped or missed.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=MeQEJc38,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-11-28T05:35:42.725+0000)
>
> It's just still being looked into is all. We're helping where we can, but if you don't make your own post it's pretty likely we won't notice a reply. If you don't reply to my comment specifically, it won't ever notify me. It'd also get fixed a lot quicker if you shoot a ticket over, since that won't ever get skipped or missed.

My case has been solved. Good job rito. Hope everyone else who had the same problem will get resolved too. <3{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I havent recieved reward for lvl up too happened 37-38 today. please help. I loged in after few hours agian and nothing

Hey, check out the Riot comment above. I found making my own post helped. I also sent a ticket in case it gets missed.

Best of luck!
